Welcome.Name: Try out the core mechanic of the game.

CherryPaper.Name: Blow up 4 or more plants with a single Cherry Bomb.

BigWallNut.Name: Place a Wall-nut on top of another Wall-nut.

Puff.Name: Use a Scaredy-shroom or Fume-shroom to spread the Puff-Shroom.

SunBomb.Name: Use Solar Bomb to explode 10 zombies at once.

BigWallNut2.Name: Use Wall-nut to crush 10 zombies at once.

BigWallNut3.Name: Use Wall-nut to deal 20,000 damage at the same zombie.

HypnoShroom.Name: Use Hypno-shroom to hypnotize a zombie.

ScaredyHypno.Name: Use Trippy-shroom to forcefully hypnotize zombies.

HypnoNut.Name: Summon a Golden Mystery-box Zombie from Hypno-nut.

LilyPad.Name: Make Lily Pad produce a Plant
LilyPad.Text: The young lotus has just revealed its pointed tip.

ThreePeater.Name: Plant a Threepeater on the edge lanes, making it shoot 2 peas per row in its lane.

ThreeSpike.Name: Use Weed-spreader to burst tires.
ThreeSpike.Text: Why do we still need Spikerock?

StarBlover.Name: Use Starblover to attract star projectiles.

CabbageUmbrella.Name: Use Umbrella Kale to bounce catapult projectiles.

GoldMelon.Name: Let a rain of golden melon fall from the sky.

SquashTorch.Name: Use Squashed Torchwood to produce a Squash.

AshThreePeater.Name: Light another fire on Scorched Threepeater.

SuperThreePeater.Name: Let Threepeater rise from the ashes.

SuperStar.Name: Watch a meteor fall from the sky.

MagnetShroom2.Name: Connect 50 Plants in a Magnetic System.

UltimateStar2.Name: Make Magnetar's meteor damage exceed more 1800.

HypnoMagnet.Name: Summon a Mecha Gargantuar from a Hypno Magnet.

SunMagnet.Name: Use Solar Magnet to produce a metal object.

SuperCherryShooter.Name: Discover Explod-o-shooter.
SuperCherryShooter.Text: Did he just shoot a cherrybomb?

CobCannon.Name: Discover Cob Cannon
CobCannon.Text: The Calmness of the Older Generation

IceCannon.Name: Use Cryo Cannon to fuse Plants.

FireCannon.Name: Use Pyro Cannon to fuse Plants.

EmeraldUmbrella.Name: Use Midas Umbrella to mock the trident.

RedEmeraldUmbrella.Name: Use Aegis Umbrella to reflect zombie projectiles.

Plantern.Name: Make a Plant's Lumos Level greater than 10.

CattailPlant.Name: Put Fertilizer on a Lily Pad.

WallNut.Name: Use Wall-nut to defend against Zombies.

UltimateTallNut.Name: Use Obsidian-nut to defend against explosions.

SuperMachineNut.Name: Heal Giga Mecha-nut until its health exceeds 1 million.

SuperSunNut.Name: Spawn a Giant-nut from Twin Solar-nut.

UltimatePumpkin.Name: Use Laser Pumpkin to defend against airborne Zombies.

MelonJump.Name: Use an Umbrella Plant to bounce off a Pogo Melon Zombie back to the ground.

Sub.Name: Stay tuned for the next updates!

Travel_noBuff.Name: Finish Odyssey Mode without selecting any modifiers.

Travel_noNut.Name: Finish Odyssey Mode without using Cherryzilla, Obsidian-nut, Giga Mecha-nut, and Twin Solar-nut.
Travel_noNut.Text: The Best Defense is a Good Offense

Travel_sun.Name: Spend more than 1 million Sun in a single round of Odyssey Mode.

Travel_fast.Name: Finish Odyssey Mode in under 40 minutes.

SuperMachineNut_health.Name: Heal Giga Mecha-nut until its health exceeds 100 million.
SuperMachineNut_health.Text: Do you have nothing better to do?

SuperDamage.Name: Take down an Abyssal Gargantuar under 10 seconds without Corruption Buff.
